front.title: Seamless Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) with MPLS Label Verification Extension

abstract.t: This specification defines a generic simplified mechanism to use Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) with large portions of negotiation aspects eliminated, and to allow full and partial reachability validations. For MPLS based BFD, extensions to the generic mechanism are defined for BFD to perform a level of label verifications.
